direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate strings based on numeric inputs and use similar formatting logic.
Both methods generate strings by concatenating resolved values from predefined keys.
Both methods modify the state of the object by generating and manipulating strings.
Both methods heavily rely on the resolve method to access and format data.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of DecimalFormatSymbols for proper string formatting.
The resolve method is crucial for setting up the data needed by promotionCode.
Both methods generate strings that need to be verified for correct format.
